title: Most popular product brands on Facebook 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Facebook fans in millions for 10 number of Platforms.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
The difference of Facebook fans in millions between the highest and lowest Platform is 159.62.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Facebook fans in millions in the y axis.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Facebook fans in millions for 10 number of Platforms.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
The difference of Facebook fans in millions between the highest and lowest Platform is 159.62.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Facebook fans in millions in each Platform on the y axis.
The Facebook fans in millions is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
The difference of Facebook fans in millions between the highest and lowest Platform is 159.62.
Platform Facebook is higher than any other Platforms with value 214.62, followed by Samsung, and Coca-Cola. Down to Platform KFC with the lowest value 55.0.
The Platform KFC tends to be 2.23 percent lower than average.
